scenario_name: Normal Customer Onboarding in Investment Banking
description: A new high-net-worth individual is onboarding with a private wealth management firm. The AI agent assists the onboarding team by verifying the client's identity, assessing risk profile, and recommending suitable investment products.
initial_goal: Onboard a new high-net-worth client, ensuring compliance with KYC/AML regulations and internal risk guidelines.
constraints: time_constraint: complete onboarding within 5 business days
